pageContext.title: Dogma
pageContext.tagline: Revamped Wee Heavy. Luscious. Malty. Fruity.
pageContext.description: Brewed with over ten different types of malt, and blended together with Scottish heather honey, it is a pantheon to the gods of intricacy and nuance; a beer that celebratesa confluence of ideas. Complex, indulgent and encapsulating, Dogma gives more than a cursory nod to history, to make you ponder the very nature of beer itself.
pageContext.author: Ali Skinner <AliSkinner>
